item.description:
Join us for glamorous evening of fun and fashion! This is one of Smiling Stiletto's signature events and charity fundraiser held at beautiful Center Court inside Copley Place. For those that are able to arrive at 6pm- there is a special shopping opportunity from 6:00-6:30pm (check-in at the event entrance to find out about the cool shopping discounts).

All guests will enjoy complimentary:

  • Bulldog Gin cocktails
  • Blue Hills Brewery beer
  • Saka Water
  • Finale desserts
  • Sweet M's Bake Shop cupcakes
  • Legal Seafood appetizers
  • Chef Bernard appetizers
  • Molana Restaurant appetizers
  • Pop Chips
  • Cabot Cheese

The fashion show will feature Smiling Stiletto Shoe Club members modeling gorgeous fashions by top retailers.

Special guest Meredith Goldstein, Love Letters advice columnist at the Boston Globe and author, will be joining us and giving away a few copies of her upcoming novel.  Ladies: Be sure to break out your sexiest shoes for the famous Best-in-Shoe competition and a chance to show off your sexy shoes on the catwalk! 

 Every guest will go home with a terrific swag bag.

All of the proceeds benefit Project Smile, the non profit organization helping children involved in traumatic events and the Simon Youth Foundation. Tickets are only $20 and can be purchased below. This is a 21+ event. You must get your ticket in advance. This event will sell out!

http://www.smilingstiletto.com/#!events

Guys- this is an event for you too. Who wants to miss an event with lots of pretty ladies wearing sexy clothes and shoes in attendance??
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 6:30pm inside the event entrance. Event takes place at Center Court in Copley Place- which is near the giant waterfall in the center of the mall. If you have trouble finding us, call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.name: Step into Spring Fashion Show and Cocktail Party at Copley Place
